textsMy.name: info_1
textsMy.text: Before you will send a new ticket, please check the following steps and links.

textsMy.name: purpose
textsMy.text: What purpose it is intended to meet by the new LAPTOP? (mandatory)

textsMy.name: improvements
textsMy.text: Responsible manager for potential improvements (full name and department)? (mandatory)

textsMy.name: fields_filled
textsMy.text: All of the mandatory fields have to be filled properly.

checkboxMy.name: under
checkboxMy.text: If you need to buy equipment which is under 200 EUR you only need to have approved the purchase by email of manager from your departure.

checkboxMy.name: more_than
checkboxMy.text: If you need to buy equipment which is more than 200 EUR you always have to ask your manager to fill Approval form.

checkboxMy.name: purchase
checkboxMy.text: Purchase of a new LAPTOP usually takes two weeks.
